distinct
from t_course
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_course (courseId, courseName, courseIntroduction, courseImg, courseLength, courseStartTime, courseEndTime, teacherId, courseCharge, courseNumAccount, coursePush) values (#{courseid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseintroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courselength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coursestarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courseendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teacherid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coursecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coursenumaccount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coursepush,jdbcType=BIGINT})
